statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_registration WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_brand, owner_name FROM vehicle_registration WHERE registration_number = 'AB1234';
SELECT owner_name, owner_contact FROM vehicle_registration WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_registration WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT vehicle_type, registration_number FROM vehicle_registration WHERE owner_contact = '123456789';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_registration WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' AND registration_number LIKE 'KA%'
SELECT owner_name, owner_contact FROM vehicle_registration WHERE vehicle_type = 'Motorcycle'
SELECT vehicle_brand, registration_number FROM vehicle_registration WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' ORDER BY vehicle_brand ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_registration WHERE vehicle_type = 'Van' ORDER BY registration_number DESC
SELECT owner_name, owner_contact, vehicle_brand FROM vehicle_registration WHERE owner_contact LIKE '%123%'
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_type;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection WHERE collection_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_type, license_plate FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT collection_time, amount FROM toll_collection ORDER BY collection_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT license_plate, vehicle_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY license_plate ASC;
SELECT * FROM toll_collection WHERE collection_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.vehicle_type, t.amount FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN toll_collection t ON v.vehicle_id = t.vehicle_id WHERE t.amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY t.amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleRegistration;
SELECT owner_name, plate_number FROM VehicleRegistration WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TollBooths WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM TollTransactions;
SELECT owner_name, location FROM VehicleRegistration JOIN TollBooths ON VehicleRegistration.vehicle_id = TollBooths.booth_id;
SELECT * FROM VehicleRegistration WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, plate_number, registration_date FROM VehicleRegistration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TollTransactions WHERE amount > 50.00 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, tt.amount, v.owner_name FROM TollTransactions t INNER JOIN VehicleRegistration v ON t.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id INNER JOIN TollBooths b ON t.booth_id = b.booth_id WHERE v.owner_name = 'John Doe' AND b.location = 'Main Street';

SELECT v.owner_name, b.location, tt.amount FROM TollTransactions tt LEFT JOIN VehicleRegistration v ON tt.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id LEFT JOIN TollBooths b ON tt.booth_id = b.booth_id WHERE v.owner_name IS NOT NULL AND b.operator_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, registration_date FROM vehicles ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT license_plate, registration_date FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type='car';
SELECT * FROM toll_booths WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type='Car' AND registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, license_plate FROM vehicles ORDER BY license_plate DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM toll_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;

SELECT t.transaction_id, v.vehicle_type, b.location, t.transaction_date FROM toll_transactions t JOIN vehicles v ON t.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN toll_booths b ON t.booth_id = b.booth_id WHERE t.amount < 500 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM users u LEFT JOIN toll_transactions t ON u.user_id = v.user_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, plate_number, owner_name FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_type='Car';
SELECT owner_name, contact_number FROM VehicleOwner WHERE address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT location, operator_name FROM TollBooth ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_datetime FROM TollTransaction WHERE amount > 50 ORDER BY transaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_id, plate_number, owner_name FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT t.transaction_id, v.plate_number, t.amount FROM TollTransaction t JOIN Vehicle v ON t.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id GROUP BY t.transaction_id;
SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.plate_number, o.owner_name FROM Vehicle v LEFT JOIN VehicleOwner o ON v.owner_name = o.owner_name;
SELECT v.owner_name, COUNT(*) AS vehicle_count FROM Vehicle v GROUP BY v.owner_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
